pages.text: 89|24|Kare wa,`a , watashi no (shorai no) seimei no tame ni,(zenko o) takuwaete itanaraba.' To gen'u.
89|25|Sorede sonohi, dare mo nashi enai hodo no chobatsu o kuwae rare,
89|26|mata dare mo kosoku shi enai hodo ni sokubaku nasa reru.
89|27|(Zenko o tsunda tamashi ni iwa rerudearou. ) O, anshin, taigo shite iru tamashi yo,
89|28|anata no omo ni kaere, kanki shi o man'etsu ni azukatte.
89|29|Anata wa, waga shimo be no naka ni ire.
89|30|Anata wa, waga rakuen ni ire.
90|1|Ware wa kono machi ni oite chikau.
90|2|Anata wa kono machi no (ijuken o motsu) jumindearu.
90|3|Umu mono to umareru mono ni kakete (chikau).
90|4|Hontoni ware wa, ningen o roku suru yo ni tsukutta.
90|5|Kare (ningen) wa, nanimono mo, jibun o sayu suru mono wa nai to kangaeru no ka.
90|6|Kare wa,`watashi wa taihen'na zaisan o tsuiyashita.' To iu.
90|7|Kare wa, dare mo kare o miteinai to kangaeru no ka.
90|8|Ware wa, kare no tame ni ryome o tsukuttade wanai ka,
90|9|matahitotsu no shita to futatsu no kuchibiru o.
90|10|Sarani futatsunomichi o kare ni shimeshita (de wanai ka).
90|11|Daga kare wa, kewashi michi o torou to wa shinai.
90|12|Kewashi michi ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka.
90|13|(Soreha) dorei o kaiho shi,
90|14|matawa kiga no hi ni wa shokumotsu o dashite,
90|15|chikai enja no minashigo o,
90|16|matawa hidoku awarena hinja o (yashinau koto).
90|17|Sore kara shinko suru mono ni natte nintai no tame ni hagemashi ai, tagaini shinsetsu, onjo o tsukushi au (kotodearu).
90|18|Korera wa migite no nakamadearu.
90|19|Daga waga shirushi o kyohi suru mono, kare-ra wa hidarite no nakamadearu.
90|20|Kare-ra no ue ni wa, goka ga oikabusarudearou.
